pages.raw_text:
[SECTION: Header]
[HEADER]
Manufacturer: TXC
Series: 7M
Component Type: MHz Crystal

[SECTION: Features]
[FEATURES]
- Frequency range: 10MHz to 114MHz
- Ceramic SMD package
- Seam sealing
- External dimensions (mm): L: 3.2 x W: 2.5 x H: 0.7
- RoHS compliant & Pb free

[SECTION: Electrical Characteristics]
[ELECTRICAL CHARACTERISTICS TABLE]
1. Frequency Range (F0):
   - Specification: 10MHz ~ 114MHz

2. Frequency Tolerance (F_tol) at 25°C:
   - Specification: ±30ppm, ±20ppm, ±10ppm

3. Frequency Stability over Operating Temperature Range (F_stab) (refer to 25°C):
   - ±30 ppm, ±20 ppm, ±10 ppm over -20°C ~ +70°C
   - ±30 ppm, ±20 ppm, ±15 ppm over -40°C ~ +85°C
   - ±60 ppm over -40°C ~ +125°C

4. Operating Temperature Range (T_OTR):
   - -20°C ~ +70°C
   - -40°C ~ +85°C
   - -40°C ~ +125°C

5. Shunt Capacitance (C0):
   - 3pF Max.

6. Drive Level (D_L):
   - Range: 1~200µW
   - Typical: 100µW

7. Load Capacitance (C_L):
   - Standard values: 6pF, 7pF, 8pF, 9pF, 10pF, 12pF, 16pF, 18pF, 20pF

8. Aging (at 25°C ±3°C, first year) (F_aging):
   - ±3ppm Max. (See Note [1])

9. Storage Temperature Range (T_STR):
   - -40°C ~ +85°C

[SECTION: Applications]
[APPLICATIONS]
- Bluetooth, Wireless LAN
- Cellular phone, Pager, DSC
- Display, TV
- Computer peripherals
- Consumer products

[SECTION: Notes]
[NOTES]
[1] Please contact us for low aging +/-1ppm grade crystals.

[SECTION: Motional Resistance (ESR)]
[MOTIONAL RESISTANCE (ESR) TABLE]
Configuration: Fundamental
- 10~12 MHz: 1500 Ohms Max.
- 12~16 MHz: 800 Ohms Max.
- 16~20 MHz: 600 Ohms Max.
- 20~64 MHz: 500 Ohms Max.

Configuration: 3rd Overtone
- 60~80 MHz: 800 Ohms Max.
- 80~114 MHz: 600 Ohms Max.

[SECTION: Footer]
[FOOTER]
Rev. 1.09
Page 1
Website: www.txccrystal.com

[SECTION: Dimensions & Physical Layout]
[DIMENSIONS & PHYSICAL LAYOUT]
Unit: mm
Length: 3.20 ± 0.1
Width: 2.50 ± 0.1
Height: 0.70 ± 0.1

[SECTION: Pin Configuration / Connection]
[PIN CONFIGURATION / CONNECTION]
(Inferred from "Crystal Connection - Top View" diagram)
- Pin 1: Crystal (Input/Output)
- Pin 2: GND (Cover)
- Pin 3: Crystal (Input/Output)
- Pin 4: GND (Cover)

[SECTION: Suggested Land Pattern / Layout]
[SUGGESTED LAND PATTERN / LAYOUT]
(Inferred from Top View Suggested Layout diagram)
- Pad Spacing (Lengthwise): 1.4mm pads with 0.8mm gap
- Pad Spacing (Widthwise): 1.2mm pads with 0.5mm gap

[SECTION: Ordering Information / Part Number Decoder]
[ORDERING INFORMATION / PART NUMBER DECODER]
Example Part Number: 7M 20.000M A H E T

1. Series Code:
   - 7M (MHz Crystal)

2. Frequency:
   - In Hz (e.g., 20.000M)

3. Load Capacitance Code (3rd Variable):
   - B: 6 pF
   - Y: 7 pF
   - V: 8 pF
   - C: 9 pF
   - Q: 10 pF
   - E: 12 pF
   - I: 16 pF
   - J: 18 pF
   - K: 20 pF

4. Frequency Tolerance Code (at 25°C) (4th Variable):
   - A: ±30 ppm
   - D: ±20 ppm
   - E: ±10 ppm

5. Frequency Stability Code (over Temp) (5th Variable):
   - F: ±20 ppm (-20°C ~ +70°C)
   - G: ±30 ppm (-20°C ~ +70°C)
   - H: ±10 ppm (-20°C ~ +70°C)
   - I: ±10 ppm (-30°C ~ +85°C)
   - J: ±30 ppm (-40°C ~ +85°C)
   - K: ±20 ppm (-40°C ~ +85°C)
   - L: ±15 ppm (-40°C ~ +85°C)
   - M: ±60 ppm (-40°C ~ +125°C)

6. Packaging Code (6th Variable):
   - T: Tape & Reel

[SECTION: Note on Frequencies]
[NOTE ON FREQUENCIES]
- "Please contact us for available frequencies"

[SECTION: Footer]
[FOOTER]
Rev. 1.09
Page 2
Website: www.txccrystal.com

[SECTION: Packaging Dimensions – Reel]
[PACKAGING DIMENSIONS - REEL]
(Inferred from Reel Drawing)
- Standard Reel Diameter (L): 178 ± 1.00 mm
- Hub Diameter (L1): 60.2 ± 0.50 mm
- Reel Width (W): 11.5 ± 0.2 mm
- Inner Width (W1): 8 ± 0.1 mm
- Center Hole Diameter: 13 ± 0.5 mm
- Material rotation indicated: Counter-clockwise

[SECTION: Packaging Dimensions – Tape]
[PACKAGING DIMENSIONS - TAPE]
(Inferred from Tape Drawing and Table)
Dimensions (mm):
- A: 1.65 ± 0.10
- B: 3.40 ± 0.10
- C: 2.70 ± 0.10
- D: 4.00 ± 0.10
- E: 8.00 ± 0.20
- F: 4.00 ± 0.10
- G: 1.55 ± 0.05
- H: 1.75 ± 0.10

[SECTION: Reflow Profile]
[REFLOW PROFILE]
(Inferred from Graph and Text)
- Total Time: 120 seconds preheat + 60 seconds reflow (approx)
- Preheat Stage:
  - Temperature: Rise from room temp to 150°C - 180°C
  - Duration: 120 sec
- Reflow Stage (Soldering):
  - Melting Point: 220°C ± 10°C
  - Duration above melting point: 60 sec. Min.
- Peak Temperature:
  - Temp: 260°C ± 10°C
  - Duration at Peak: 10 sec. Max.

[SECTION: Footer]
[FOOTER]
Rev. 1.09
Page 3
Website: www.txccrystal.com
